resources.string: With LOSORB Technology that ensures your food absorbs upto 29% less oil Saffola Tastyâ€™s Dual Seed Technology gives you the goodness of 2 oils in 1. It ensures a good balance of MUFA and PUFA for better nutrition through fats, compared to single seed oils With Oryzanol that helps maintain healthy cholesterol levels Fortified with Vitamin A which helps against night blindness & Vitamin D which supports strong bones This vegetable oil brings alive the natural flavour of the food cooked & spices used, without altering any flavour High smoke point which is ideal for all types of cooking
